mode.name: Working Mode (see info)
mode.description:
What the numbers mean:

0: Vanilla Behavior (uses your color primary color)
1: Secondary Color
2: Player Glow Color
3: Custom (set below!)

color.name: Custom Color
color.description: Set the custom progress bar color here. Working mode must be set to 3.

issues.info: Please report any problem you have to this mod's GitHub repository by making an issue!
